statements: SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE swap_id = 100;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE sender_address = '0x4D9B92D7Cfe6b20Ef5E2f5B908eC77624720C00F';
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT swap_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE sender_address = '0xabcdef123456' ORDER BY swap_id ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM cross_chain_swaps GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING max_amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_swaps FROM cross_chain_swaps;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cross_chain_swaps GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swap_info ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT swap_id, from_asset, to_asset, amount FROM cross_chain_swap_info WHERE from_chain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT chain_name, network_url FROM blockchain_networks WHERE chain_name LIKE 'Ethereum%';
SELECT swap_id, from_asset, to_asset, amount, timestamp FROM cross_chain_swap_info WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swap_info ORDER BY from_chain_id, to_chain_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swap_info WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT swap_id, from_asset, to_asset, amount FROM cross_chain_swap_info WHERE from_chain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT from_chain_id, to_chain_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cross_chain_swap_info GROUP BY from_chain_id, to_chain_id;
SELECT c.swap_id, c.from_asset, b.chain_name, b.network_url FROM cross_chain_swap_info c JOIN blockchain_networks b ON c.from_chain_id = b.chain_id;
SELECT COUNT(*), to_chain_id FROM cross_chain_swap_info WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY to_chain_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CrossChainSwaps;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT eth_swap_id, swap_id, eth_address FROM EthereumSwaps ORDER BY eth_swap_id DESC;
SELECT btc_swap_id, btc_address, received_amount FROM BitcoinSwaps WHERE received_amount > 1000;
SELECT swap_id, btc_address, status FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY swap_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE status = 'in_progress';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT eth_address, received_amount FROM EthereumSwaps JOIN CrossChainSwaps ON EthereumSwaps.swap_id = CrossChainSwaps.swap_id WHERE CrossChainSwaps.receiver_address = '0xABCDEF';
SELECT btc_address, received_amount FROM BitcoinSwaps WHERE swap_id IN (SELECT swap_id FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE status = 'completed');
SELECT * FROM CrossChainSwaps CROSS JOIN EthereumSwaps CROSS JOIN BitcoinSwaps WHERE CrossChainSwaps.swap_id = EthereumSwaps.swap_id AND CrossChainSwaps.swap_id = BitcoinSwaps.swap_id;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT id, from_chain, to_chain, amount FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT from_chain, to_chain, status FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE from_asset = 'ETH' AND to_asset = 'BTC';
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM swap_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT participant_address, swap_id FROM swap_participants WHERE swap_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT from_chain, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cross_chain_swaps GROUP BY from_chain ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT from_chain, to_chain, from_asset, to_asset, amount FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM cross_chain_swaps WHERE from_chain = 'Ethereum' AND to_chain = 'Binance Smart Chain';
SELECT * FROM CrossChainSwaps ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE sender_chain = 'Ethereum';
SELECT sender_chain, receiver_chain, amount FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SwapTransactions WHERE status = 'completed' AND amount <= 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT asset_name, token_address FROM ChainAssets WHERE chain_name = 'Binance Chain';
SELECT * FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM CrossChainSwaps WHERE sender_chain = 'Ethereum' AND receiver_chain = 'Binance' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM SwapTransactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT a.chain_name, a.asset_name, v.validator_address, v.stake_amount FROM ChainAssets a JOIN ChainValidators v ON a.chain_name = v.chain_name;
SELECT block_id, block_number, chain_name FROM ChainBlocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY block_number DESC;
